**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**

**Request for Information (RFI)**

# Private Cloud Solution for Government of Canada

The Government of Canada is seeking industry insights on a Private Cloud Solution, specifically focusing on Hardware as a Service (HaaS) and Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) Platform. This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather valuable information to enhance the government's digital infrastructure.

## Background

To meet the needs of citizens and further simplify, secure, and efficient delivery of government services, the Government of Canada is expanding its cloud services portfolio. This initiative is outlined in the 2024-2025 Departmental Plan of Shared Services Canada (SSC).

## Objective of the RFI

The primary objective of this RFI is to gather insights from industry experts regarding HaaS and IaaS Platforms for a Private Cloud Solution. Respondents are invited to provide their answers to the questions in the Response Form by the closing date.

## Information Webinar

Respondents are encouraged to participate in an informational webinar on March 27, 2024, to discuss any questions they may have about the RFI. Registration is mandatory, and interested parties must contact the Contracting Authority prior to the webinar date.

## Webinar Details

* English-language webinar: 9:30 a.m. – 10:30 a.m. EDT on March 27, 2024
* French-language webinar: 11:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m. EDT on March 27, 2024

## Language and Submissions

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Respondents are invited to submit their answers in English or French.

## Contact Information

All enquiries regarding this RFI should be directed to:

PVRCloudServicesRCRs.DCCServicesinfonuagiquesARF@ssc-spc.gc.ca
